comment: : Fact-checkers - facts are rare-ish . Most news works with opinions + narratives , using the term fact-checkers is misleading at best /5
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / person
            :ARG0-of (c / check-01
                  :ARG1 (f / fact))
            :domain (p2 / person
                  :ARG0-of (c2 / check-01
                        :ARG1 (f2 / fact)))
            :mod (r / rare-ish))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (w / work-09
                  :ARG1 (n / news
                        :mod (m2 / most))
                  :ARG2 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (o / opine-01)
                        :op2 (n2 / narrate-01)))
            :op2 (m3 / mislead-01
                  :ARG0 (u / use-01
                        :ARG1 (t / term-01
                              :ARG1 (p3 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (c3 / check-01
                                          :ARG1 (f3 / fact)))))
                  :mod (a3 / at-best))))
